lead_paragraph: KUKIN--Doris. The entire Yeshiva University family mourns the passing of Doris Kukin, who with her beloved and revered husband, Dr. Ira Kukin, are Benefactors of Yeshiva University and were among the founders of the Sy Syms School of Business where she and her husband established the Doris and Dr. Ira Kukin Entrepreneurial Executive Lecture Series. Doris Kukin also served as a member of the Stern College for Women Board of Overseers where she and her husband established the Dr. and Mrs. Ira Kukin Scholarship Fund. She was a devout Jew whose family is highly respected for their support for institutions of higher Jewish and secular studies. She was also active in many other philanthropic causes. Above all, Doris Kukin was a devoted wife, loving mother, and a doting grandmother and great- grandmother whose legacy of kindness and love for her entire community is emulated by her children and all her loved ones. May the Kukin family, who will observe Shiva after the Passover festival, be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
